title: iraivan urai
sahitya:
iraivan urai kOyil inda nark-kAyam muraiyuDan pENuvOm moimburavE


anupallavi

  karai oru shiridEnum kAnbadarkkillAmal kaTTurudiyuDanE kavin pera sheivOm


caraNam    mAyai iruL keDukkum jnAna viLakkeDuppOm manpadaik-kuzhaikkumOr manat-tiran vaLarppOm
Aya kalaigaLinAl aNi pera sheivOm anbin nilaikkaLanAi AkkiyE magizhvOm
